channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Britain’s iFi Audio Reveals Its New Flagship IDSD Phantom DAC, Streamer And Headphone Amp
item.description: iFi has created a reference-class DAC, high-resolution network and high-end headphone amplifier in one device, billed as iFi's most accomplished liste...

item.title: Meta Quest Future Isn’t As Dark As Made Out, Says VR Pioneer
item.description: Claims it's game over for Meta VR are overstated, says Oculus VR founder Palmer Luckey, following major layoffs and studio closures at Meta.

item.title: Managing The Now And The Next Is Leadership’s Hardest Job Today
item.description: Leaders are optimizing performance today while falling behind on AI readiness and skills for tomorrow. Workforce data reveals why managing both is now...

item.title: Washington's proposed millionaire tax sparks concerns of broader levy, 'damage' to state's economy
item.description: Washington state GOP Chair Jim Walsh opposes the proposed millionaire tax, saying "nobody wants it" and warns that it could lead to broader income tax...

item.title: Today’s NYT Mini Crossword Hints, Answers For Tuesday, January 20
item.description: Looking for some help with today's NYT Mini crossword? In that case, extra clues and the answers are right here for you.

item.title: Khosla-backed Formulary raises oversubscribed $4.6 million seed round for its AI-powered private fund manager software
item.description: As private markets explode, founder Alfia Ilicheva wants to automate the tedium of tracking data.

item.title: The SJCAM C400 Is A Creative Camcorder Designed For Vloggers Looking For Action Shots

item.title: Last year, AI hype wowed Davos. This year, leaders are obsessing over how to use the technology at scale
item.description: Also: All the news and watercooler chat from Fortune.

item.title: Market latest: Dow futures down over 700 points after three-day break
Bessent to Europe on Greenland threats: Don't be hysterical
Natural gas futures soar 20% on worries over Northeast freeze
PwC’s global chairman says most leaders have forgotten ‘the basics’ as new research shows 56% are still getting ‘nothing’ out of AI adoption
item.description: PwC's Mohamed Kande talked to Fortune about the "tri-modal mandate" for leaders to execute, transform and build: "I've not seen that in 25 years."

item.title: Americans' paychecks grow stronger as Main Street shows new economic strength
item.description: New economic data reveals Main Street strength as Americans see higher pay, while retail sales rose 3.3% and home purchases increased amid lower mortg...

item.title: The curious case of the ICE pastor as Minnesota protesters disrupt church services and DOJ launches investigation
item.description: "To have someone serving as a pastor who oversees these ICE agents, is almost unfathomable to me,” said Nekima Levy Armstrong, a reverend herself.

item.title: Airlines have 580 million reasons to like GLP-1 weight-loss drugs, analysis finds
item.description: U.S. airline companies stand to save hundreds of millions each year from Americans losing weight thanks to GLP-1 drugs, according to a new study.

item.title: NATO vs. ‘TACO’ trade: Dow futures tumble 400 points on Trump’s latest tariffs while Wall Street hopes for de-escalation at Davos
item.description: "As such, the more likely outcome, in our view, is that both sides recognize that a major escalation would be a lose-lose proposition, and that compro...

item.title: Miami eyes massive $3B sports economic boost as Trump expected to attend college football championship
item.description: South Florida's ultimate sporting events lineup for 2026 delivers billions in economic impact, positioning Miami as the premier sports tourism destina...

item.title: 13K pounds of ready-to-eat grilled chicken breasts recalled over possible listeria contamination
item.description: More than 13,000 pounds of grilled chicken breasts distributed to seven states were recalled over concerns they may be contaminated with listeria.

item.title: U.S. stock futures sink as trade tensions ramp up over Trump’s Greenland demands
Jerome Powell will attend Supreme Court hearing on Lisa Cook’s firing
Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
